Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted and holds immense value to us. Considering its quality and uniqueness, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. We are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $20000. This opportunity is not to be missed, as it represents an excellent investment and showcases our commitment to providing unparalleled products. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of sharing this extraordinary product with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $20,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $20,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
